about_the_game:
Expand your wardrobe and weapon skin collection and dominate the fashion floor in Killing Floor 2 with this year’s Cosmetic Season Pass! The most dosh-efficient way to gain immediate access to the previous seasons’ cosmetic and weapon skin collections and all cosmetic bundles released in 2023.
Purchase immediately includes 9 new cosmetic bundles released with the Summer and Fall 2023 Update!

  • Combat Diver Uniform
  • Stingray Weapon Skin Bundle Pack
  • Predator Weapon Skin Bundle Pack
  • Jaeger MKIV Weapon Skin Bundle Pack
  • Junkyard MKII Weapon Skin Bundle Pack
  • Spectre MKIII HRG Weapon Skin Bundle Pack
  • Medieval MKII Weapon Skin Bundle Pack
  • Chameleon MKIV Weapon Skin Bundle Pack
  • Last Stand Outfit Bundle
…as well as 43 Previously Released Outfits, Weapon Skin Sets, and Accessory Bundles.

Current Content Included with purchase:
Character Outfit Bundles
  • Day of the Zed Character Outfit Set
  • Deep Sea Explorer Outfit Bundle
  • Holiday Shopper Outfit Bundle
  • Plague Doctor Outfit Bundle
  • Train Conductor Outfit Bundle
  • Horzine Diver Outfit Bundle
  • Last Stand Outfit Bundle

content_descriptors.notes: Killing Floor 2 features intense violence, blood and gore that includes decapitation or dismemberment. Combat is held with both realistic and futuristic weaponry and frequently have large explosions and realistic gunfire; certain attacks are highlighted by slow-motion effects.

name: Killing Floor 2 - Cosmetics Season Pass

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Killing Floor 2 - Cosmetics Season Pass - $29.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Killing Floor 2 - Cosmetics Season Pass

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Win7 64-bit, Win8/8.1 64-bit
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo E8200 2.66GHz or Phenom II X2 545
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 250 or Radeon HD 4830
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: UNSUPPORTED HARDWARE: IntelHD Integrated Graphics Chips, 32-bit Operating Systems, NVIDIA ® FleX features require a GeForce ® GTX™ 770 or higher (GeForce ® GTX™ 980 recommended)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Core 2 Quad Q9550 2.83GHz or Phenom II X4 955
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or Radeon HD 6950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: NVIDIA ® FleX features require a GeForce ® GTX™ 770 or higher (GeForce ® GTX™ 980 recommended)

esrb.descriptors:
Blood and Gore
Intense Violence
Language
Partial Nudity

short_description: Expand your wardrobe and weapon skin collection and dominate the fashion floor in Killing Floor 2 with this year’s Cosmetic Season Pass! The most dosh-efficient way to gain immediate access to the previous seasons’ cosmetic and weapon skin collections and all upcoming 2023 cosmetic bundles.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Polish, Russian*, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
